info.name: Flickr - Flickr WideScreen - Hidden Top NavBar v.2
info.description:
FLICKR - 3

It's for a WIDESCREEN(1920x1080)!
Hide the Top Nav Bar until you hover the Litlle Red Arrow ( at the middle/ top).
or the MAIL Alert Envelope Icon with the number of Mails Waiting (Appear only if you receive a mail...)

<mark>▶ Please Comment and give Feedback if you like this Style :-)</mark>
info.additionalInfo: It's for a WIDESCREEN(1920x1080)! ▶ Support this greasemonkey scripts: ▷ "Flickr Quick Links" (GM) (USO Mirror) by steeev My Backup : GM - FLickr Quick Links (by Andreas Schaefer) - TWEAK It's a part of my "Flickr WideScreen Collection". ▶ The First one (It's better with it!): Flickr WideScreen - ALLinONE it add the support (which can be incule in a next version) of the Pool Beta : With a discrete Beta message / toggle link and the Top menu fixed at the top of it Add a Dark/Grey Style?. ▶ Flickr WideScreen - Dark & Grey The "Flickr WideScreen Collection" : ▶ Flickr Small Justified ( Paginator+Counter) - For Flickr Userscripts (GM: cf greasemonkey): ► Flickr WideScreen - SCRIPT - Commented ON-FLUID ▶ Flickr WideScreen - Script (GM) - Flickr Functional Suite(Update 2014) - For Flickr Viewers : ► Flickr WideScreen - FlickrHiveMind ► Flickr WideScreen - DACKR Viewer ▷ Thumbnail Preview : These Styles are better with this Useful Addon/Script to preview thumbnail on hover: ▶ Thumbnail Zoom Plus ▶ "Splash Album Viewer Fixed" - AutoPager support(Splash album viewer Fixed (USO :8080)) For More information on Scripts and Addons that i use a lot with FLICKR (in Flickr Hacks discuss): ► My BIG LIST ► Userscripts Group : "Flickr ★ Surf" (USO MIRROR)
